ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: HG and KMH have conceived the study, coordinated the data collection, analyzed the data and drafted the manuscript. MP analyzed the data, derived conclusions and participated in manuscript revisions. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: This research was funded by the COMET program of FFG (Austrian Research Promotion Agency) within the “alpS - Centre for Climate Change Adaptation Technologies”.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
